english: I can not bring him to my point of view .
chinese: 我无法说服他同意我的观点。

english: We carry this essay with his permission .
chinese: 我们发表此文得到他的同意。

english: If you agreed , so ; if not , so .
chinese: 要是同意，好；要是不同意，也好。

english: I quite agree with everything he said just now .
On no consideration can we agree to this .
chinese: 我们绝对不能同意这一点。
同意造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In the long run he forced me to an agreement .

chinese: 他们却热诚地同意这行动。

english: They all concurred in giving him the prize .
chinese: 他们一致同意给他奖赏。

english: I assume that your silence implies consent .
chinese: 我想你沉默即表示同意。

english: Matauoka had agreed with this line of thought .
Japan were acquiescing in being strangled .
chinese: 日本默然同意别人把它捏死。

english: She agreed without the slightest hesitation .
The licensor simply agrees to provide technology .
He agreed, but it was with short grace .
chinese: 他表示同意，但是态度非常勉强。

english: The committee are well disposed towards the idea .
